title: Fantasy RPG Ambient Music Pack
description: This music pack contains 12 professional tracks that will help you create memorable fantasy ambiences to level up your project!
longDescription:
🎵 PREVIEW


This music pack contains:


  • A collection of 12 loopable tracks, mixed and mastered.
  • These tracks recreate the sound of the ambient music of game genres like JRPG, RPG, metroidvania, action, adventure,...
  • 44.1 kHz and 16 bits.
  • Some songs have 2 sections, the intro and the loop.
  • I also included the full version of the tracks.
  • You can use this assets for commercial projects.
  • Also in some of the tracks there is a real flute, played and recorded by me!
  • Youtube content ID free

If you're interested in having me create custom music for your project, please don't hesitate to contact me at: eduardoguerraarencibia@gmail.com


I'm always excited to collaborate with other creatives and help bring their visions to life through music!
